partintro.para: Part II builds on the basics by working through higher-level tools and techniques for using OCaml effectively. Here you'll learn about useful libraries for building command-line interfaces and networked applications, as well as functional design patterns that help combine different features of the language to good effect.
The focus throughout this section is on networked systems, and among other examples we'll build a simple tool that will perform Internet queries using the DuckDuckGo search engine.
